title: MIRACLE ON 34TH STREET Admission
meta_description: Tickets to MIRACLE ON 34TH STREET at RISE. Please select your performance and ticket type. Friday and Saturday shows are at 7:30 pm and Sunday shows are at 2:00.Our performance for SUNDAY, DECEMBER 8th isSOLD OUT. Tickets are still available for all other performances.Discounted ticket descriptions:Child includes children 12 and underStudent includes anyone ages 13-18, as well as college students with a current IDSenior includes anyone 60 and overMilitary includes first responders (fire, police, etc), active as well as retired
